definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The Indian Ocean and sub-continent is a very big pie, China.
sentences.chinese: 印度洋和印度次大陸是一塊非常大的蛋糕。

sentences.english: The only word with all the vowels in reverse order is subcontinental.
sentences.chinese: 唯一一個包括所有逆序元音的單詞是“次大陸的”。

sentences.english: Beyond this ocean lies the rich subcontinent of India.
sentences.chinese: 海的那一邊有富饒的印度次大陸。

sentences.english: Bollywood movies are the most popular form of entertainment across the subcontinent.
sentences.chinese: 寶萊塢電影是整個次大陸地區最受歡迎的娛樂形式。

sentences.english: Similar findings have emerged in the Indian sub-continent and the Americas.
sentences.chinese: 印度次大陸和美洲也出現了類似的發現。

sentences.english: It is separated from the Indian subcontinent by the Gulf of Mannar and the Palk Strait.
sentences.chinese: 馬納爾灣和保克海峽將其與印度次大陸分開。
